instruction:
Please choose the correct solution to the question: How to make Strawberry Kiwi Sauce at home.

Solution1: Boil 1 cup Kiwi (chopped), 1 cup chopped strawberries  with 3/4 cup water and  1 cup Olive pits for 30 min., stirring to keep from scorching over med. heat on the stove top.

Solution2: Boil 1 cup Kiwi (chopped), 1 cup chopped strawberries  with 3/4 cup water and  1 cup sugar for 30 min., stirring to keep from scorching over med. heat on the stove top.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: Make organic air freshener.

Solution1: Mix baking soda and vegetable oil in a jar, cover with cloth and rubber band.

Solution2: Mix baking soda and essential oils in a jar, cover with cloth and rubber band.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: Cutting and Gluing the Cardboard

Solution1: After drawing the wooden frame and door on cardboard you are ready to cut and paste. With your box cutter cut the pizza boxes in small pieces pizza box  along the marks drawn to make the wooden frame and door. Place glue on card board wher the hous piece meet to make the frame and door.

Solution2: After drawing the wooden frame and door on cardboard you are ready to cut and paste. With your box cutter cut the pizza boxes in small pieces pizza box  along the marks drawn to make the wooden frame and door. Place glue on card board wher the hous piece meet to make the frame and door let dry.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: How to make Hershey's Gold Vanilla Ice Cream at home.

Solution1: In a large bowl combine 4 cups half and half (Or light cream)1 1/2 cups sugar, and 1 tablespoon vanilla.  Stir until sugar dissolves.  Stir in 2 cups whipping cream. Chill in refrigerator for 1 hour. Freeze in 4 or 5 quart Ice cream freezer according to manufacturers directions.  After freezing for 20 min. add 4 cups diced Hershey's Gold Candy Bars. Return to freezing mode.  Complete freezing process.  Top with melted Caramel.

Solution2: In a large bowl combine 4 cups half and half (Or light cream)1 1/2 cups sugar, and 1 tablespoon vanilla.  Stir until sugar dissolves.  Stir in 2 cups whipping cream. Chill in refrigerator for 1 hour. Freeze in 4 or 5 quart Ice cream freezer according to manufacturers directions.  After freezing for 20 min. add 4 cups diced Hershey's Gold Candy Bars. Return to freezing mode.  Complete freezing process.  Top with 2 cups melted lard.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: What tools do you need to make a suncatcher?

Solution1: You need tape, a CD, a printed design, and tape.

Solution2: You need tape, a CD, a printed design, and a VHS tape.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: Baby proof a shopping cart.

Solution1: Wrap pool noodle around shopping cart bar.

Solution2: Wrap pool noodle around shopping cart wheels.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: How to Raise Threadfin Rainbowfish Fry

Solution1: If you don't have breeding threadfins, you can easily purchase vials of eggs off Ebay. Place the eggs in an aquarium half full of clean, dechlorinated water heater to 87-89 degrees farenheit. Add a small sponge filter. Feed the fry zooplankton and tiny insects fromgreen water until they are big enough for artemia. Do 1000% water changes every other day.

Solution2: If you don't have breeding threadfins, you can easily purchase vials of eggs off Ebay. Place the eggs in an aquarium half full of clean, dechlorinated water heater to 87-89 degrees farenheit. Add a small sponge filter. Feed the fry zooplankton and tiny insects fromgreen water until they are big enough for artemia. Do 10% water changes every other day.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: how do you eat boiled egg?

Solution1: just eat the egg itself.

Solution2: cut off the white that is around the yolk and eat the yolk.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: How to brush your dog?

Solution1: Take a dog brush and brush the dog’s fur along the grain of its fur.

Solution2: Take a dog brush and brush the dog’s fur against the grain of its fur.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: To bend a PVC conduit,

Solution1: Use a heat source on the conduit. A flamethrower is recommended. Point the flamethrower  toward the spot you wand the conduit to bend and turn it on. Bend with your hands gently. Be sure to wear gloves doing so or you might be burned.

Solution2: Use a heat source on the conduit. A heat gun is recommended. Point the heat gun toward the spot you wand the conduit to bend and turn it on. Bend with your hands gently. Be sure to wear gloves doing so or you might be burned.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Solution1: can stand on  foil 

Solution2: can wrap around  foil

Please choose the correct solution to the question: How to cut dragonfly wings out of metal.

Solution1: Use cutting disc and cut along lines carefully.

Solution2: Use scissors and cut along lines carefully.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: how to keep earbuds from tangling?

Solution1: make a notch in both sides of an old credit card, and wrap the earbuds around it.

Solution2: spray with WD-40, before putting in your backpack.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: how do you cover the lens of a nikon b500 when it's off?

Solution1: place the lid on top of it.

Solution2: place a cloth on top of it.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: What if you have the nagging feeling you haven't installed your new car seat right?

Solution1: Take the seat to the nearest firehose and the fire fighters there will help to show you how to do it.(They do this regularly - it's no big ask).

Solution2: Take the seat to the nearest firehouse and the fire fighters there will help to show you how to do it.(They do this regularly - it's no big ask).

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: How should I drill the hole in the back of the frame?

Solution1: Carefully poke a hole through the back by using a Phillips head screwdriver and striking the end with a hammer. You can eyeball the location since it doesn't have to be exact.

Solution2: Carefully drill the hole with a portable drill with a small bit. You can eyeball the location since it doesn't have to be exact.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: Attach tooth picks to a cork board to create a thread spool holder.

Solution1: Place tooth picks pointed side down into cork board at 3 inch intervals. Lightly tap the top of the tooth pick at a horizontal angle with a rubber mallet to anchor into the cork board to create a thread spool holder.

Solution2: Place tooth picks pointed side down into cork board at 3 inch intervals. Lightly tap the top of the tooth pick at a horizontal angle with a rubber mallet to anchor into the cookie sheet to create a thread spool holder.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: To join pieces of plastic straws together for curved, polygonal art.

Solution1: Run bendable wire through the straws to join pieces.

Solution2: Run metal rods through the straws to join pieces.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: How to whip up a batch of body butter.

Solution1: Melt 60 grams of shea butter, 10 grams of almond oil in a saucepan and blend with a fork, finish off by pouring into a pretty jar.

Solution2: Melt 60 grams of shea butter, 10 grams of almond oil in a saucepan and blend with a whisk, finish off by pouring into a pretty jar.

Answer format: solution1/solution2

Please choose the correct solution to the question: Increase smoothness of hair.

Solution1: Soak hair in brewed coffee before shower.

Solution2: Soak hair in brewed tea before shower.

Answer format: solution1/solution2
